title: Bounty Inspectors
author: Bounty Inspectors
created_time: August 21, 2023, 10:30:18 AMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 04:36:57 PM by Bounty Inspectors
content: ⛤ WEBSITE ⛤ TELEGRAM Channel  ⛤  Twitter ⛤__________________________•  Buy  Water Fun Bounty campaign will run 4 weeks and managed by Bounty Inspectors management service.•  By joining this campaign all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.• All participants must join/follow the  Official social account  of  Buy Water Fun  above to get accepted.• using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty campaign immediately and all your account will be banned permanently.• However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.• We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must visit Water  Website and must join Buy Water Fun's officialTelegram Channel and  Twitter.2. All participants must join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channeland Twitter.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Inspectors Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.10. Negative Trusted Accounts not allowed into this Campaign.11. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.12. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.  Proof of authentication post format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address: Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets /Tweets Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5.Twitter               60%Telegram          40%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 150 approved participants.Telegram:  First 100 approved participants.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1: 21/08- 27/08Week 2: 28/08 - 03/09Week 3: 04/09 - 10/09Week 4: 11/09- 17/09Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 15,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Buy Water Fun's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours @BuyWaterFun  #WATER $WATER #BuyWaterFun # Crypto #BTC  hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join Buy Water Fun's official Telegram Channel  and Twitter Account.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Water .(Example: BountyInspectors | Water)2. Replace your profile picture with  Water Logo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC , Bitmart etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear Buy Water Fun's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join Buy Water Fun's official Telegram Channel  and Twitter Account.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.
